channel.title: Protobuf: change data type
channel.description:
Change data type in [service.proto](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/blob/dev/protobuf/serviceapi/api.proto) from string to bytes
- EmitEventRequest.eventData - TaskData.inputData - SubmitResultRequest.outputData
We can even introduce `DataEncoding` field in the feature if needed.

item.title: Protobuf: change data type
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
We are now using a struct for all the data https://github.com/mesg-foundation/engine/blob/dev/protobuf/types/struct.proto

This way we donâ€™t need to have to deal with any encoding anymore and we can have structured and typed data

Read full topic

item.title: Protobuf: change data type

item.description:
Change data type in service.proto from string to bytes

  • EmitEventRequest.eventData
  • TaskData.inputData
  • SubmitResultRequest.outputData

We can even introduce DataEncoding field in the feature if needed.
